item.description:
State Senator Andy Sanborn was the New Hampshire Co-Chair for Ron Paul's 2012 campaign, and is now running for re-election in the newly configured 9th District, which goes from Bedford to Richmond.

Join us at the Draft on Monday, August 6th to prepare mailings that are going out to the district. No phone calls, no door knocking, just a social atmosphere and a great way to help a great candidate! We will also have some free refreshments available.

Meet upstairs at 5pm, we will stay until about 8pm or later if people want!

For questions contact Andrew Sharp, 603-397-9440 or asharp@andysanborn.com
item.name: Mail Party for Andy Sanborn
